Uses of Class
bayou.mime.ContentType

  • Packages that use ContentType 
    Package Description
    bayou.file
    Utilities for files.
    bayou.form
    Html form handling.
    bayou.html
    For building html trees.
    bayou.http
    Http server.
    bayou.mime
    MIME related utilities.
    bayou.text
    Utilities for texts.

    • Uses of ContentType in bayou.html

      Methods in bayou.html that return ContentType 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default ContentType HtmlDoc.getContentType()
      Get the content type of this document, by default, "text/html;charset=UTF-8".
